msbt.message: The shrubs that Leif sells at his shop are truly stylish plants. They grow with such confidence! Since we're in the midst of Nature Day celebrations, why not pick up a seedling and see for yourself? It's good for the planet AND good for your home-decor reputation. And both are very important, my dear!

Why, , did you know that shrubs can grow one right next to the other without any gaps? It's the perfect way to make a hedge wall around your home!A hedge around a home is like a gorgeous green wall around a castle, don't you think? ThoughI suppose it wouldn't keep dragons out now would it, ?

Did you know that wearing flowers in your hair is ALL the rage right now? It's true, darling! You know, Leif sells some rare flowers that could be turned into a gorgeous crown. You should give it a try. You'll look flower fabulous, !

Have you ever had your flowers trampled by someone who wasn't looking where they were going? Well, I have, and it's simply awful!And that's why it's never a bad idea to build a sturdy fence around one's flower beds. It not only protects your gorgeous flowers from careless stompers, it also looks rather stylish.

I am so very grateful to all the wonderful plants of the world, .Not only do plants make everything look SO much more beautiful, they purify the very air we breathe! We owe them so much, I almost feel bad complaining about the ones that make mesneeze. Almost.
